demolition

Class BombGuy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Figure
      • demolition.BombGuy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGraphic, IUserControllable

    public class BombGuy
extends Figure
implements IUserControllable

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class demolition.Figure

        downSprite1, downSprite2, downSprite3, downSprite4, leftSprite1, leftSprite2, leftSprite3, leftSprite4, moveDown, moveLeft, moveRight, moveUp, RENDER_SPRITE, replace, replaceX, replaceY, reset, rightSprite1, rightSprite2, rightSprite3, rightSprite4, spriteTimer, upSprite1, upSprite2, upSprite3, upSprite4, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BombGuy(int x, int y)
      Creates a new bomb guy object which will be instantiated based on the runner class, where the object's control and methods are run

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bombDeployed()
      Sets the bomb deploy boolean to be false to indicate the bomb has been deployed
      boolean bombReady()
      Returns true if a bomb is ready to be deployed, false otherwise
      void nextLevel()
      Sets bomb guy's map to be the second level
      void pressDown()
      Moves bomb guy one tile down if there is an empty tile available in the position, otherwise it keeps bomb guy in its current position Also makes changes to the bomb guy's movement direction
      void pressLeft()
      Moves bomb guy one tile left if there is an empty tile available in the position, otherwise it keeps bomb guy in its current position Also makes changes to the bomb guy's movement direction
      void pressRight()
      Moves bomb guy one tile right if there is an empty tile available in the position, otherwise it keeps bomb guy in its current position Also makes changes to the bomb guy's movement direction
      void pressSpace()
      Deploys a bomb at the position of bomb guy's current coordinates
      void pressUp()
      Moves bomb guy one tile up if there is an empty tile available in the position, otherwise it keeps bomb guy in its current position Also makes changes to the bomb guy's movement direction
      void tick()
      Updates the map according to any changes made by the player's actions, including loading level 2, reset of level 1 and level 2 and replacing broken walls

      • Methods inherited from class demolition.Figure

        draw, gameReset, getDownSprite1, getDownSprite2, getDownSprite3, getDownSprite4, getLeftSprite1, getLeftSprite2, getLeftSprite3, getLeftSprite4, getRightSprite1, getRightSprite2, getRightSprite3, getRightSprite4, getUpSprite1, getUpSprite2, getUpSprite3, getUpSprite4, getX, getY, resetReplace, resetSpriteTimer, setSprite, spriteTick, wallReplace

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BombGuy

        public BombGuy(int x,
               int y)
        Creates a new bomb guy object which will be instantiated based on the runner class, where the object's control and methods are run
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate where bomb guy is created
        y - the y-coordinate where bomb guy is created
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        Figure, IUserControllable
